item.title: Disney investors say handling of Jimmy Kimmel suspension put politics over shareholders, demand records
item.description: A group of Disney investors are seeking board materials, communications and policies related to the suspension of "Jimmy Kimmel Live!"

item.title: AI can now pass the hardest level of the CFA exam in a matter of minutes
item.description: Previous research had found AI could clear Levels I and II of the CFA exam, but it struggled with Level III, due to the essay questions.
